snippet: Goals by Ezequiel Lavezzi and Javier Pastore gave Paris Saint-Germain a 2-1 away win at Valencia in a the first leg of their Champions League Round of 16 match Tuesday.
abstract: Paris St-Germain beats Valencia, 2-1, and Juventus defeats Celtic, 3-0, in the first leg of the Champions League Round of 16; other soccer news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and JACK BELL

lead_paragraph: Goals by Ezequiel Lavezzi and Javier Pastore gave Paris Saint-Germain a 2-1 away win at Valencia in a the first leg of their Champions League Round of 16 match Tuesday.
